Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Argyle
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Argyle due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Argyle due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Pulaski.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
